input_text:
Job Title: Sales Representative

Location: Pennington, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Build tools that are shaping the future of travel.
At Travefy our mission is to power the success of travel professionals.
Our platform – including trip proposal, itinerary management, and client management tools – help Travel Advisors, Tour Operators, and other professionals efficiently grow their businesses. We’re proud that Travefy powers thousands of travel businesses across the globe and are excited to grow our team with others who have a passion to solve problems and transform the travel industry.
Sales Representatives (SRs) at Travefy are an integral part of our growth and expansion. We seek someone to support our sales efforts in identifying and acquiring new customers across segments and verticals.
As a lean team, SRs at Travefy are never a cog in the machine and always own their own work streams, with ample opportunities for learning, development and most importantly – impact. Sales team members love bringing their “A-game” everyday—and are driven by self-initiative and opportunity.
This position is available in Lincoln, Nebraska, Omaha, Nebraska or Pennington, New Jersey.
Roles & Responsibilities
As an SR you will:Identify potential customer segments and leadsOwn and manage a portfolio of inbound leadsDevelop and execute outbound sales strategiesMaster the intricacies of B2B SaaS sales from cold call or email to closeProvide demos and support to prospective customers and leadsTravel for and represent Travefy at conferences and other related sales opportunitiesYou'd Be A Great Fit If
You are a high-energy self-starter with an infectiously positive attitudeYou are ambitious, motivated, and sales-mindedYou are someone who excels in a dynamic, results driven environmentYou are a problem solver and critical thinker with fantastic professional communication skillsYou’re a good listener and empathetic to user needs and empathetic to users Requirements
You are a strong written and verbal communicatorYou have clear experience in a customer-facing or sales roleExperience with SaaS technology or the travel industry is a plus!
Benefits
Starting at $60K target compensation including salary, target commission, and bonusHealthcare, Dental, and Vision coverage for you and your family in addition to Disability Insurance and Life Insurance.401(k) Retirement Plan with automatic company contributionAn Unlimited Vacation Policy including an Annual Travel StipendEnjoy a technology budget, food budget, and fun work environmentAnd more…
You must apply on Travefy's career site: https://careers.travefy.com/

Experience Level (if available): None
